attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: "Heelies" are shoes that have wheels on them, but look like normal trainers. Many children wear these, and I, and many others, find this very annoying and irritating - with these children using "Heelies" in public places, flying all over the place and causing all kinds of obstruction/annoyance, not to mention that they are dangerous in small or cramped spaces (such as a busy shopping centre).
